channel.title: A little low budget Pc Build
channel.description:
I am on a budget of 60 dollars, USD, Anyways I Need to buy, A pc Case, 4gb of ram, And A bigger hard drive, My total is about 50-55 USD, Anyways here are the items Im looking at now, Just something Simple
(Case): "http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16811353055&cm_re=DIYPC_Solo-T1-BK_Black_USB_3.0_ATX_Mid_Tower_Gaming_Computer_Case_with_2_x_Blue_Fans_%281_x_120mm_LED_fan_x_front%2c_1_x_120mm_fan_x_rear%29_Pre-installed-_-11-353-055-_-Product"
(Ram): "http://www.ebay.com/itm/4GB-DDR2-800-MHZ-PC2-6400-240-PIN-DIMM-Desktop-Laptop-Memory-RAM-AMD-Motherboard-/361366460159?hash=item54231e96ff:g:VFsAAOSwyQtV0TzI"
(HDD): "http://www.ebay.com/itm/200GB-IDE-3-5-Desktop-PC-Hard-Drive-HDD-Wiped-Working-/191776527711?hash=item2ca6c5955f:g:9awAAOSwKtlWjXoc"
As i said nothing to Over powered simple for low end Gaming, I dont play really new games, Mostly doing this to play CS:GO, And Some others I know, So far I have (Cpu): Intel Core 2 Duo, E4700, "2.6ghz"
(case): Busted up case looks like garbage.
(Installed Ram): 1gb DDR2
(Gpu): "Inno3D nVidia Geforce 8400GS 1GB Dedicated" (Something good enough for me)
Should I switch to Win 8 Or stay with 7, And if you guys/girls can find anything that is the same for cheaper, Only 1 slot on my Mobo works so I need a single stick,Until I get the money to buy my dream I will use this. Thank you

item.title: A little low budget Pc Build
item.dc:creator: @runeypk runeypk
item.description:
@runeypk wrote:

[quote=“Pwnd, post:4, topic:554619”][quote author=Death Style link=topic=673538.msg4503617#msg4503617 date=1454390466]
get windows 7
[/quote]

And wow, they still sell mobos with single DIMM slots?[/quote]

My mobo is from 2006… xD

Read full topic

item.title: A little low budget Pc Build
item.dc:creator: @naseem142 naseem142
item.description:
@naseem142 wrote:

http://pcpartpicker.com/p/HNkyJx

its $4 more but its the closest you can get to cheap and reliable for now,

as for windows , you should probably upgrade rather than stay with 7 in my opinion. unless its too expensive , but you can always get it some other way

Read full topic
